data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nQa5MdtfDSkQ7kNvgHxfTJS&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAemcC7KTKJ7LtaeU4rmb18h5fRRtirnfNQP5DDurkwFw&oe=6699108C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EfzDYwI2F4MQ7kNvgHDCLq3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDrm7K2Bn12bJNcBxFnuV0AJAxIycp5mAbnsQWWZz3m1Q&oe=66990E9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3iadlYH18TYQ7kNvgHubSy9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAqCpB-_M3pot-Qm9u78gSwUUaAnzzRcej0PXix0qKmpQ&oe=6698F3F1)
